API.auth¶

fritter.auth.decode_auth_token(token)¶

Decodes the generated auth token. MAKE SURE THE OUTPUT IS NON-NEGATIVE

Parameters

token (str) – Token

Returns

user_id

Return type

str

fritter.auth.encode_auth_token(user_id)¶

Generates the auth token. MAKE SURE THE OUTPUT IS NON-NEGATIVE.

Parameters

user_id (str / int) – id of the user in database

Returns

The token

Return type

str

fritter.auth.login()¶

Gives a token given password and email.

Parameters

  • email (post) –

  • password (post) –

Error

Meaning

0

Success

1

Email not found

2

Incorrect password
Returns

{‘status’: int(error), ‘token’: user token}

fritter.auth.login_required(view)¶

Decorator for authorized functions.

Parameters

  • token (post) – Auth token provided by login

  • view (function) – a function.

Returns

modified function

Return type

function

fritter.auth.register()¶

Registers users.

Error

Meaning

0

Success

1

2

3

Password Missing

4

  • email (post) –

  • password (post) –
